    • Constructor Detail

      • QuestManager

        public QuestManager(java.io.File questDirectory,
                    java.io.File saveDirectory)
        Constructs a manager with the given directory information and a config file with the manager configuration section ready. The config passed is expected to have one key (the name of the manager) and the value be a list of strings (name of quests)

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()

      • registerQuest

        public void registerQuest(Quest quest)
        Registers the quest, providing no frequency information. Quests without frequency information are given equal chances of being produced when requesting a random quest.

      • removeQuest

        public void removeQuest(Quest quest)

      • stopQuests

        public void stopQuests()
        Passes a stop signal to all quest managers, requesting a soft stop. Soft stops typically save state and perform a padded stopping procedure, and are not guaranteed to stop all runningQuests.

      • haltQuests

        public void haltQuests()
        Immediately halts all running runningQuests.

      • getSaveLocation

        public java.io.File getSaveLocation()

      • getScoreboard

        public org.bukkit.scoreboard.Scoreboard getScoreboard()

      • getQuestTemplate

        public QuestConfiguration getQuestTemplate(java.lang.String questName)
        Looks up the matching quest config based on name. This manager does not look beyond the quests allowed to it
        Returns:
        the Quest Configuration used as a template, or null if it wasn't found

      • getQuestTemplates

        public java.util.List<QuestConfiguration> getQuestTemplates()

      • getNPC

        public NPC getNPC(java.lang.String name)
        Looks up an NPC by it's name. If there are multiple NPC's by the same name, lookup behavior is undefined.
        Returns:
        An NPC with the given name, or null if it doesn't exist

      • getRunningQuests

        public java.util.List<Quest> getRunningQuests()

      • onPortal

        public void onPortal(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityCreatePortalEvent e)

      • registerNPC

        public void registerNPC(NPC questNPC)
        Registers an NPC as an aux NPC to avoid removal. These NPCs are not cleaned up and are the responsibility of the creator to use unregisterNPC(NPC)

      • unregisterNPC

        public void unregisterNPC(NPC questNPC)
